{{sld|Wolverine and the X-Men #23}}{{g|Named and represented}} | Quotation = Fais Ce Que Tu Voudras ("Do Whatever You Want") | Speaker = School Motto | QuoteSource = | History = ===Origin=== The Hellfire Academy was founded by [[Kade Kilgore (Earth-616)|Kade Kilgore]], the [[Black King]] of the [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]].{{r|Wolverine and the X-Men #23}} Kilgore recruited villainous mutant outlaws to act as faculty, and began traveling the country (and possible the world) enrolling newly manifesting mutants to attend this school.{{r|Wolverine and the X-Men #20}} This academy serves as a direct opponent to the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Jean Grey School for Higher Learning]]'s [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]].{{r|Wolverine and the X-Men #23}} [[File:Hellfire Academy (Earth-616) 03.jpeg|left|thumb]] One purpose of the Academy was to form great mutant villains, in order to boost the sales of his [[Sentinels]].{{r|Wolverine and the X-Men #31}} Kade Kilgore and his staff recruited both in the new mutants pool and in the Grey School ranks. While they tried and successfully brought in [[Robert Herman (Earth-616)|Glob Herman]], [[Idie Okonkwo (Earth-616)|Oya]], [[Quintavius Quire (Earth-616)|Kid Omega]], along with [[Mortimer Toynbee (Earth-616)|Toad]], they also recruited the new-comers [[Infestation (Earth-616)|Infestation]], [[Mudbug (Earth-616)|Mudbug]] and [[Snot (Earth-616)|Snot]]. During the manipulation of Idie into making her to join, Broo was shot in the head by Kade Kilgore, rendering him as feral as a classic [[Brood (Race)|Brood]]. In order to "cure" him, [[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Beast]] consulted the [[Xanto Starblood (Earth-616)|Dr. Xanto Starblood]], prisoner in the [[Sentient World Observation and Response Department (Earth-616)|S.W.O.R.D.]] station of the [[Peak VII]], but the two aliens were soon recruited by [[Philistine (Earth-616)|The Philistine]]{{r|Wolverine and the X-Men #30}} [[Owen Backes (Earth-616)|Owen Backes]] was made to join by an agreement between the US military and the Hellfire Club.{{r|X-Men Vol 3 40}} ==Members== [[File:Hellfire Academy (Earth-616) from Wolverine and the X-Men Vol 1 31 0002.png|thumb|right|320px|Hellfire Academy line-up]] ===Hellfire Club Inner Circle=== * [[Kade Kilgore (Earth-616)|Black King (Kade Kilgore)]] * [[Wilhelmina Kensington (Earth-616)|White Queen (Wilhelmina Kensington)]] * [[Manuel Enduque (Earth-616)|White King (Manuel Enduque)]] * [[Maximilian Frankenstein (Earth-616)|Black Bishop (Maximilian Frankenstein)]] ===Faculty=== * [[Dog Logan (Earth-616)|Dog Logan]]{{r|Wolverine and the X-Men #29}} -
